{{exclusive|bedrock|education}}

Disconnects from the WebSocket server.

==Syntax==

: <code>closewebsocket</code>

==Parameters==

No parameters.

==Result==

This command cannot be executed by the player directly from the chat box, but can be executed from a connected WebSocket server.

After the command is executed, the connection to the WebSocket server is disconnected.
